text: Aur yeh kay tum apney gunah apney rab say moaf kerao phir ussi ki taraf mutawajja raho woh tum ko waqt-e-muqarrara tak acha saman (zindagi) dey ga aur her ziyada amal kerney walay ko ziyada sawab dey ga. Aur agar tum log aeyraaz kertay rahey to mujh ko tumharay liye aik baray din kay azab ka andesha hai
